Token.Abstract:
The name of the topic you want to create.

Constraints: Topic names must be made up of only uppercase and lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens, and must be between 1 and 256 characters long.

The name of the topic you want to create.

Constraints: Topic names must be made up of only uppercase and lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens, and must be between 1 and 256 characters long.
Default constructor for a new CreateTopicRequest object. Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.
Constructs a new CreateTopicRequest object. Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameter.Name: theName
Parameter.Abstract:
The name of the topic you want to create.

Constraints: Topic names must be made up of only uppercase and lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens, and must be between 1 and 256 characters long.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of this object.
